item.title: CRM
item.description: score:160 Chances: Advancements in artificial intelligence have been a major trend, and companies like Salesforce are well positioned to benefit from this technological shift. Salesforce’s CEO Marc Benioff believes in the potential of AI, and the company’s solutions in customer relationship management will likely see increased demand as AI becomes more pervasive.
